name: Toast Shooter
description:
Toast Shooter is a fast action packed arcade style tap-the-right-item game!

Get your Jelly Cannon ready for all those tasty butter toasts jumping out of the toasters. But be careful - do not hit the dark toasts! Catch Rocket Toasts, Collect Bonuses- and Power Stars, repair defect toasters, get tap-combos and play bonus rounds to beat the high score!

Let your fingers fly ... FAST!

A fun game for all ages!

The iPad version is available in the app store too. Toast Shooter HD reached the TOP 10 in some stores and categories!

You can choose between two game modes
===============================

Time Trial
------------
Make the most out of two minutes. The duration of a game is max. two minutes. Taping a dark Toast costs 5 seconds. The game will end if you run out of Jelly Power.

Long Run
------------
The game ends if you run out of Jelly Power.

Jelly Power
=========
Don't run out of Jelly Power. Increase it by taping Rocket Toasts or Power Starts.

Toast
=====
Taping a toast scores 1 point. If you miss a toast or let it escape your Jelly Power is decreased.

Dark Toast
=========
Taping a Dark Toast decreases your Jelly Power. In Time Trial mode it decreases the time by 5 seconds.

Rocket Toast
==========
Tap a Rocket Toast - it scores 5 points, increases your Jelly Power and releases a Power Star.

Egg Toast
========
Sometimes an Egg Toast sneaks in. Tapping it scores 10 points and the next 15 Toasts released will appear in 'giant size' for easy tapping.

Power Star
=========
Tap a Power Star to increase your Jelly Power. Collect 4 to enter the bonus round.

Bonus Round
==========
All toasters release Bonus Starts for 15 seconds. Collecting a Bonus Star scores 5 points. Misses don't decrease Jelly Power.

Defect Toaster
===========
Tap a defect toaster to repair it ( scores 10 points ). Each tap releases a Bonus Star.

Tap Combo
=========
Tapping 3 or more items really fast scores a combo bonus of 10 points.

Timer
=====
The game gets more and more difficult each time the timer runs out or a new Toaster enters the screen. You earn extra Jelly-Power with each new level. Your Jelly Power 'value' is added to your score if you reach a new level ( e.a. if your Jelly Power is at 75% you earn 75 points... ).

GameCenter
==========
Toast Shooter is GameCenter enabled. Compete with other players world wide.
